title: Minion block has got to stop (especially for allied minions)

embed.description: Post with 0 views. Shared by leftyraydy.

body: I should have been able to get away with my passive... I barely get hit by the final ability thanks minions for the block. Can we please get rid of ally minions block!!!!!

replies.body: Minions have become mobile walls from time to time. It's out of control.
Would make the game a lot more fun. No one likes minion block, it is just annoying. Though some champs would need to be balanced around it, like Singed or anyone that wants to run at you.

Did you actually expect a single rotation to be able to kill him? You died because you were oblivious to your mana pool, not because of minion block.

He used e on you anyway. He would have killed you whether or not you were minion blocked.
dude my pathing was ruined by minion block. my own minions... he barely clipped me with that last ability. I would have lived plan and simple.

He used his e _after_ the minion block. If you hadn't been minion blocked, he still would've been in e range. So that w still would have "barely clipped" you. 

You also could've used your own e sideways instead of directly away from a linear skillshot

"after the minion block" again you do not know I would have had more space and been closer to the turret. he may have died instead of killing me. I lost a lot of ground/space because of that Minion block. so I don't think you know what you are talking about.

lol

You got minion blocked, sure, but you're also refusing to admit that you made multiple mistakes, which makes you look a bit ridiculous

I have to agree on this, but the point is not the mistakes that he made, but how he got blocked. I too don't think he would have made it out and if he did it would be by the skin of his teeth, but that block really just cemented his punishment for the mistakes he made

those fucking minions got me killed soo many times in really aggravating ways.

and more than once while up toplane or botlane I'd get pinned into a wall by these stupid fucks. 
When they removed allied minion block it seems that caused some discontent, then it got modified and then removed entirely I think because the people coding that were just damned lazy or it was too much for their tiny brains to manage.

more than likely they just hotpatched old code in and removed it rather than correct and fix it.

It was GLORIOUS when you could weave among your own troops.

Now? they will nearly shove you aside just to hit lane or they block you entirely from moving past them if you're moving with the wave and trying to pass by them.

Now, I just let those fuckers pass me. it sucks but that's where we're at now.

Just make the pathing algorithm better. Done. If the gap is smaller than the champ, don't let it path there. If there is an obstacle in the way (i.e. a turret), don't dance around (alternating between directions), choose a direction and stick to it. I had it that i had to get past one minion and my champ just kept on dancing in front of the minion instead of just running around the freaking thing.

I don't mind minion block, but just give a little more tolerance so that it's a little easier to get through, especially allied minions. I enjoy melee assassins, but i struggle my ass off to farm efficiently because my path is suddenly cut off even though i am returning to a spot i literally just came from (no minion movement), or the existing gap is suddenly smaller than my champ even though there should be just enough room for it to run through.

If it is really necessary to navigate centimeter by centimeter, tell me and i will adjust the way i play, but it feels to me as if navigating around minions is getting worse patch by patch.
